content: is left then break working yarn and pull it through final st to complete bobble us men s shoe size 6-8 5 9-11 5 12-14 foot length 9 25-10 10 25-11 11 25-12 short row foot circumference 8 9 10 there are several options for how to handle short row so you may see different suggestions/intructions in a pattern sock height 7 5 8 8 5 wrap and turn w&t one option for short row us children s shoe size 10-13 1-3 4-6 work until the st to be wrapped if knitting bring yarn to child youth youth front sl next st p-wise return yarn to back turn work and sl wrapped st onto rh needle cont across row if purling bring foot length 6 5-7 5 7 75-8 5 8 75-9 5 yarn to back of work sl next st p-wise return yarn to front foot circumference 6 6 5 7 turn work and sl wrapped st onto rh needle cont across row sock height 4 5 5 5 6 5 picking up wraps work to wrapped st if knitting insert rh needle under wrap then through wrapped st k-wise k st and wrap decrease if purling sl wrapped st p-wise onto rh needle use lh needle to lift wrap and place it onto rh needle sl wrap and st back onto lh needle and p decrease a tutorial can be found at https //tutorials knitpicks com /short-row-wrap-and-turn-or-wt
